import React from 'react'; import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import 'swiper/css'; import 'swiper/css/pagination'; import { Pagination, Autoplay } from 'swiper/modules'; const Introduction = () => { return (
{/* Slide 1 */}

Hello! I'm Hazel

I'm passionate about programming systems and creating elegant solutions.

{/* Slide 2 */}

Explore my projects and achievements.

{/* Slide 3 */}

Let's Collaborate

); }; export default Introduction;
